mc.name: Lavaclaw Reaches
mc.oracleText:
Lavaclaw Reaches enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {B} or {R} to your mana pool.
{1}{B}{R}: Until end of turn, Lavaclaw Reaches becomes a 2/2 black and red Elemental creature with "{X}: This creature gets +X/+0 until end of turn." It's still a land.
mc.printedText:
Lavaclaw Reaches enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {B} or {R} to your mana pool.
{1}{B}{R}: Until end of turn, Lavaclaw Reaches becomes a 2/2 black and red Elemental creature with "{X}: This creature gets +X/+0 until end of turn." It's still a land.

mc.name: Anowon, the Ruin Sage
mc.oracleText: At the beginning of your upkeep, each player sacrifices a non-Vampire creature.
mc.printedText: At the beginning of your upkeep, each player sacrifices a non-Vampire creature.
mc.flavorText: "So many have died in search of that map. And now it appears in the hands of the arrogant child Chandra Nalaar."

mc.name: Creeping Tar Pit
mc.oracleText:
Creeping Tar Pit enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {U} or {B} to your mana pool.
{1}{U}{B}: Until end of turn, Creeping Tar Pit becomes a 3/2 blue and black Elemental creature and is unblockable. It's still a land.
mc.printedText:
Creeping Tar Pit enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {U} or {B} to your mana pool.
{1}{U}{B}: Until end of turn, Creeping Tar Pit becomes a 3/2 blue and black Elemental creature and is unblockable. It's still a land.

mc.name: Celestial Colonnade
mc.oracleText:
Celestial Colonnade enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {W} or {U} to your mana pool.
{3}{W}{U}: Until end of turn, Celestial Colonnade becomes a 4/4 white and blue Elemental creature with flying and vigilance. It's still a land.
mc.printedText:
Celestial Colonnade enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {W} or {U} to your mana pool.
{3}{W}{U}: Until end of turn, Celestial Colonnade becomes a 4/4 white and blue Elemental creature with flying and vigilance. It's still a land.

mc.name: Stirring Wildwood
mc.oracleText:
Stirring Wildwood enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {G} or {W} to your mana pool.
{1}{G}{W}: Until end of turn, Stirring Wildwood becomes a 3/4 green and white Elemental creature with reach. It's still a land.
mc.printedText:
Stirring Wildwood enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {G} or {W} to your mana pool.
{1}{G}{W}: Until end of turn, Stirring Wildwood becomes a 3/4 green and white Elemental creature with reach. It's still a land.

mc.name: Raging Ravine
mc.oracleText:
Raging Ravine enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {R} or {G} to your mana pool.
{2}{R}{G}: Until end of turn, Raging Ravine becomes a 3/3 red and green Elemental creature with "Whenever this creature attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on it." It's still a land.
mc.printedText:
Raging Ravine enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {R} or {G} to your mana pool.
{2}{R}{G}: Until end of turn, Raging Ravine becomes a 3/3 red and green Elemental creature with "Whenever this creature attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on it." It's still a land.

mc.name: Horizon Drake
mc.oracleText: Flying, protection from lands
mc.printedText: Flying, protection from lands
mc.flavorText: Using thermal updrafts and gravity currents, drakes eat and sleep in the air. Some never touch the ground from birth until death.

mc.name: Crusher Zendikon
mc.oracleText:
Enchant land
Enchanted land is a 4/2 red Beast creature with trample. It's still a land.
When enchanted land is put into a graveyard, return that card to its owner's hand.
mc.printedText:
Enchant land
Enchanted land is a 4/2 red Beast creature with trample. It's still a land.
When enchanted land is put into a graveyard, return that card to its owner's hand.

mc.name: Lightkeeper of Emeria
mc.oracleText:
Multikicker {W} (You may pay an additional {W} any number of times as you cast this spell.)
Flying
When Lightkeeper of Emeria enters the battlefield, you gain 2 life for each time it was kicked.
mc.printedText:
Multikicker {W} (You may pay an additional {W} any number of times as you cast this spell.)
Flying
When Lightkeeper of Emeria enters the battlefield, you gain 2 life for each time it was kicked.

mc.name: Wolfbriar Elemental
mc.oracleText:
Multikicker {G} (You may pay an additional {G} any number of times as you cast this spell.)
When Wolfbriar Elemental enters the battlefield, put a 2/2 green Wolf creature token onto the battlefield for each time it was kicked.
mc.printedText:
Multikicker {G} (You may pay an additional {G} any number of times as you cast this spell.)
When Wolfbriar Elemental enters the battlefield, put a 2/2 green Wolf creature token onto the battlefield for each time it was kicked.

mc.name: Refraction Trap
mc.oracleText:
If an opponent cast a red instant or sorcery spell this turn, you may pay {W} rather than pay Refraction Trap's mana cost.
Prevent the next 3 damage that a source of your choice would deal to you and/or permanents you control this turn. If damage is prevented this way, Refraction Trap deals that much damage to target creature or player.
mc.printedText:
If an opponent cast a red instant or sorcery spell this turn, you may pay {W} rather than pay Refraction Trap's mana cost.
Prevent the next 3 damage that a source of your choice would deal to you and/or permanents you control this turn. If damage is prevented this way, Refraction Trap deals that much damage to target creature or player.

mc.name: Rest for the Weary
mc.oracleText:
Target player gains 4 life.
Landfall- If you had a land enter the battlefield under your control this turn, that player gains 8 life instead.
mc.printedText:
Target player gains 4 life.
Landfall -- If you had a land enter the battlefield under your control this turn, that player gains 8 life instead.
mc.flavorText: Zendikar is a brutal taskmaster, but sometimes it offers unexpected solace.

mc.name: Voyager Drake
mc.oracleText:
Multikicker {U} (You may pay an additional {U} any number of times as you cast this spell.)
Flying
When Voyager Drake enters the battlefield, up to X target creatures gain flying until end of turn, where X is the number of times Voyager Drake was kicked.
mc.printedText:
Multikicker {U} (You may pay an additional {U} any number of times as you cast this spell.)
Flying
When Voyager Drake enters the battlefield, up to X target creatures gain flying until end of turn, where X is the number of times Voyager Drake was kicked.

mc.name: Deathforge Shaman
mc.oracleText:
Multikicker {R} (You may pay an additional {R} any number of times as you cast this spell.)
When Deathforge Shaman enters the battlefield, it deals damage to target player equal to twice the number of times it was kicked.
mc.printedText:
Multikicker {R} (You may pay an additional {R} any number of times as you cast this spell.)
When Deathforge Shaman enters the battlefield, it deals damage to target player equal to twice the number of times it was kicked.

mc.name: Snapping Creeper
mc.oracleText: Landfall- Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, Snapping Creeper gains vigilance until end of turn.
mc.printedText: Landfall -- Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, Snapping Creeper gains vigilance until end of turn.
mc.flavorText: Its vast network of roots and vines keeps it aware of distant dangers.

mc.name: Grotag Thrasher
mc.oracleText: Whenever Grotag Thrasher attacks, target creature can't block this turn.
mc.printedText: Whenever Grotag Thrasher attacks, target creature can't block this turn.
mc.flavorText: The goblin fancied himself a rider. The lizard was happy with its new flail.

mc.name: Ricochet Trap
mc.oracleText:
If an opponent cast a blue spell this turn, you may pay {R} rather than pay Ricochet Trap's mana cost.
Change the target of target spell with a single target.
mc.printedText:
If an opponent cast a blue spell this turn, you may pay {R} rather than pay Ricochet Trap's mana cost.
Change the target of target spell with a single target.
mc.flavorText: In his last seconds, Remhas regretted using his most powerful spell.

mc.name: Stone Idol Trap
mc.oracleText:
Stone Idol Trap costs {1} less to cast for each attacking creature.
Put a 6/12 colorless Construct artifact creature token with trample onto the battlefield. Exile it at the beginning of your next end step.
mc.printedText:
Stone Idol Trap costs {1} less to cast for each attacking creature.
Put a 6/12 colorless Construct artifact creature token with trample onto the battlefield. Exile it at the beginning of your next end step.

mc.name: Lodestone Golem
mc.oracleText: Nonartifact spells cost {1} more to cast.
mc.printedText: Nonartifact spells cost {1} more to cast.
mc.flavorText:
"Somehow it warps the Aether. It brings a strange weight, a blockade in the flow of spellcraft."
--Noyan Dar, Tazeem lullmage

mc.name: Calcite Snapper
mc.oracleText:
Shroud (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities.)
Landfall- Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you may switch Calcite Snapper's power and toughness until end of turn.
mc.printedText:
Shroud (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities.)
Landfall -- Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you may switch Calcite Snapper's power and toughness until end of turn.

mc.name: Bloodhusk Ritualist
mc.oracleText:
Multikicker {B} (You may pay an additional {B} any number of times as you cast this spell.)
When Bloodhusk Ritualist enters the battlefield, target opponent discards a card for each time it was kicked.
mc.printedText:
Multikicker {B} (You may pay an additional {B} any number of times as you cast this spell.)
When Bloodhusk Ritualist enters the battlefield, target opponent discards a card for each time it was kicked.

mc.name: Amulet of Vigor
mc.oracleText: Whenever a permanent enters the battlefield tapped and under your control, untap it.
mc.printedText: Whenever a permanent enters the battlefield tapped and under your control, untap it.
mc.flavorText:
"After years of study, I've learned an important lesson: the relics we watch may be watching us back."
--Anowon, the Ruin Sage

mc.name: Smother
mc.oracleText: Destroy target creature with converted mana cost 3 or less. It can't be regenerated.
mc.printedText: Destroy target creature with converted mana cost 3 or less. It can't be regenerated.
mc.flavorText:
"Before I hire new recruits, I test how long they can hold their breath. You'd be surprised how often it comes up."
--Zahr Gada, Halimar expedition leader

mc.name: Fledgling Griffin
mc.oracleText: Landfall- Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, Fledgling Griffin gains flying until end of turn.
mc.printedText: Landfall -- Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, Fledgling Griffin gains flying until end of turn.
mc.flavorText:
"We're making progress, but its desire to explore still far exceeds its ability."
--Amadi, Halimar griffin-master

mc.name: Jagwasp Swarm
mc.oracleText: Flying
mc.printedText: Flying
mc.flavorText:
"You know how to tell a sapling explorer from an old hardhead? See which one mistakes a swarm of jagwasps for the setting sun."
--Chadir the Navigator

mc.name: Canopy Cover
mc.oracleText:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.
Enchanted creature can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.
mc.printedText:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.
Enchanted creature can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.

mc.name: Claws of Valakut
mc.oracleText:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+0 for each Mountain you control and has first strike.
mc.printedText:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+0 for each Mountain you control and has first strike.
mc.flavorText: "Swords may sunder. Shields may fail. My will is stronger than steel, and my flesh and bone far more deadly."

mc.name: Searing Blaze
mc.oracleText:
Searing Blaze deals 1 damage to target player and 1 damage to target creature that player controls.
Landfall- If you had a land enter the battlefield under your control this turn, Searing Blaze deals 3 damage to that player and 3 damage to that creature instead.
mc.printedText:
Searing Blaze deals 1 damage to target player and 1 damage to target creature that player controls.
Landfall -- If you had a land enter the battlefield under your control this turn, Searing Blaze deals 3 damage to that player and 3 damage to that creature instead.

mc.name: Graypelt Hunter
mc.oracleText:
Trample
Whenever Graypelt Hunter or another Ally enters the battlefield under your control, you may put a +1/+1 counter on Graypelt Hunter.
mc.printedText:
Trample
Whenever Graypelt Hunter or another Ally enters the battlefield under your control, you may put a +1/+1 counter on Graypelt Hunter.
mc.flavorText: He'll cleave wood and bone alike to carve a path for his allies.

mc.name: Groundswell
mc.oracleText:
Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
Landfall- If you had a land enter the battlefield under your control this turn, that creature gets +4/+4 until end of turn instead.
mc.printedText:
Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
Landfall -- If you had a land enter the battlefield under your control this turn, that creature gets +4/+4 until end of turn instead.
mc.flavorText: "This world will not be tamed."

mc.name: Mire's Toll
mc.oracleText: Target player reveals a number of cards from his or her hand equal to the number of Swamps you control. You choose one of them. That player discards that card.
mc.printedText: Target player reveals a number of cards from his or her hand equal to the number of Swamps you control. You choose one of them. That player discards that card.
mc.flavorText: As the bridge snapped, Berko was sure he heard the swamp laughing at him.

mc.name: Vapor Snare
mc.oracleText:
Enchant creature
You control enchanted creature.
At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Vapor Snare unless you return a land you control to its owner's hand.
mc.printedText:
Enchant creature
You control enchanted creature.
At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Vapor Snare unless you return a land you control to its owner's hand.

mc.name: Quest for Renewal
mc.oracleText:
Whenever a creature you control becomes tapped, you may put a quest counter on Quest for Renewal.
As long as there are four or more quest counters on Quest for Renewal, untap all creatures you control during each other player's untap step.
mc.printedText:
Whenever a creature you control becomes tapped, you may put a quest counter on Quest for Renewal.
As long as there are four or more quest counters on Quest for Renewal, untap all creatures you control during each other player's untap step.

mc.name: Tideforce Elemental
mc.oracleText:
{U}, {T}: You may tap or untap another target creature.
Landfall- Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you may untap Tideforce Elemental.
mc.printedText:
{U}, {T}: You may tap or untap another target creature.
Landfall -- Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you may untap Tideforce Elemental.
mc.flavorText: Ebb and flow, high tide and low, quick as sand and just as slow.

mc.name: Slingbow Trap
mc.oracleText:
If a black creature with flying is attacking, you may pay {G} rather than pay Slingbow Trap's mana cost.
Destroy target attacking creature with flying.
mc.printedText:
If a black creature with flying is attacking, you may pay {G} rather than pay Slingbow Trap's mana cost.
Destroy target attacking creature with flying.
mc.flavorText: The Tajuru elves devised ways to let the forest defend itself.

mc.name: Kitesail Apprentice
mc.oracleText: As long as Kitesail Apprentice is equipped, it gets +1/+1 and has flying.
mc.printedText: As long as Kitesail Apprentice is equipped, it gets +1/+1 and has flying.
mc.flavorText: Carving lines through the sky, kite sailors map trails for the pilgrims below to follow.

mc.name: Roiling Terrain
mc.oracleText: Destroy target land, then Roiling Terrain deals damage to that land's controller equal to the number of land cards in that player's graveyard.
mc.printedText: Destroy target land, then Roiling Terrain deals damage to that land's controller equal to the number of land cards in that player's graveyard.
mc.flavorText:
"The trembling lands ruptured, leaving an open door for things from below to emerge."
--Screed of the Mul Daya

mc.name: Talus Paladin
mc.oracleText: Whenever Talus Paladin or another Ally enters the battlefield under your control, you may have Allies you control gain lifelink until end of turn, and you may put a +1/+1 counter on Talus Paladin.
mc.printedText: Whenever Talus Paladin or another Ally enters the battlefield under your control, you may have Allies you control gain lifelink until end of turn, and you may put a +1/+1 counter on Talus Paladin.
mc.flavorText: "Why fill pockets with gold when you can fill hearts with conviction?"

mc.name: Harabaz Druid
mc.oracleText: {T}: Add X mana of any one color to your mana pool, where X is the number of Allies you control.
mc.printedText: {T}: Add X mana of any one color to your mana pool, where X is the number of Allies you control.
mc.flavorText: "I care nothing for treasure. The land beckons me, and I cannot rest until my feet have touched every inch of it."

mc.name: Ruthless Cullblade
mc.oracleText: Ruthless Cullblade gets +2/+1 as long as an opponent has 10 or less life.
mc.printedText: Ruthless Cullblade gets +2/+1 as long as an opponent has 10 or less life.
mc.flavorText: She wields a blade as bloodthirsty and elegant as herself.

mc.name: Dead Reckoning
mc.oracleText: You may put target creature card from your graveyard on top of your library. If you do, Dead Reckoning deals damage equal to that card's power to target creature.
mc.printedText: You may put target creature card from your graveyard on top of your library. If you do, Dead Reckoning deals damage equal to that card's power to target creature.
mc.flavorText: Many venture out to hunt for treasures. Others lie in wait to hunt the hunters.

mc.name: Goblin Roughrider
mc.flavorText: Astride the bucking creature, Gribble hurtled down the mountainside while his Grotag brethren cheered. It was at that moment that legend of the Skrill Tamer was born.

mc.name: Hedron Rover
mc.oracleText: Landfall- Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, Hedron Rover gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
mc.printedText: Landfall -- Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, Hedron Rover gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
mc.flavorText:
"Now that it has woken up and wandered off, we should go see what it was guarding."
--Gotzen, Bulwark explorer

mc.name: Mysteries of the Deep
mc.oracleText:
Draw two cards.
Landfall- If you had a land enter the battlefield under your control this turn, draw three cards instead.
mc.printedText:
Draw two cards.
Landfall -- If you had a land enter the battlefield under your control this turn, draw three cards instead.
mc.flavorText:
"The Roil is destructive, but not random. It's Zendikar's way of revealing secrets."
--Ilori, merfolk falconer

mc.name: Selective Memory
mc.oracleText: Search your library for any number of nonland cards and exile them. Then shuffle your library.
mc.printedText: Search your library for any number of nonland cards and exile them. Then shuffle your library.
mc.flavorText:
"I of all people know that memory is not a safe place to hide valuables."
--Jace Beleren

mc.name: Permafrost Trap
mc.oracleText:
If an opponent had a green creature enter the battlefield under his or her control this turn, you may pay {U} rather than pay Permafrost Trap's mana cost.
Tap up to two target creatures. Those creatures don't untap during their controller's next untap step.
mc.printedText:
If an opponent had a green creature enter the battlefield under his or her control this turn, you may pay {U} rather than pay Permafrost Trap's mana cost.
Tap up to two target creatures. Those creatures don't untap during their controller's next untap step.

mc.name: Join the Ranks
mc.oracleText: Put two 1/1 white Soldier Ally creature tokens onto the battlefield.
mc.printedText: Put two 1/1 white Soldier Ally creature tokens onto the battlefield.
mc.flavorText: Expeditionary houses are notorious for their rivalries. But when adventurers meet in the wilderness, the instinct for mutual survival outweighs petty grudges.

mc.name: Kor Firewalker
mc.oracleText:
Protection from red
Whenever a player casts a red spell, you may gain 1 life.
mc.printedText:
Protection from red
Whenever a player casts a red spell, you may gain 1 life.
mc.flavorText: "A river of lava is just another river to cross."

mc.name: Spell Contortion
mc.oracleText:
Multikicker {1}{U} (You may pay an additional {1}{U} any number of times as you cast this spell.)
Counter target spell unless its controller pays {2}. Draw a card for each time Spell Contortion was kicked.
mc.printedText:
Multikicker {1}{U} (You may pay an additional {1}{U} any number of times as you cast this spell.)
Counter target spell unless its controller pays {2}. Draw a card for each time Spell Contortion was kicked.

mc.name: Marsh Threader
mc.oracleText: Swampwalk
mc.printedText: Swampwalk
mc.flavorText: "Give me a sturdy rope over the advice of any so-called expert. I can thread the dark wilds better than anyone."

mc.name: Jace, the Mind Sculptor
mc.oracleText:
+2: Look at the top card of target player's library. You may put that card on the bottom of that player's library.
0: Draw three cards, then put two cards from your hand on top of your library in any order.
-1: Return target creature to its owner's hand.
-12: Exile all cards from target player's library, then that player shuffles his or her hand into his or her library.
mc.printedText:
+2: Look at the top card of target player's library. You may put that card on the bottom of that player's library.
0: Draw three cards, then put two cards from your hand on top of your library in any order.
-1: Return target creature to its owner's hand.
-12: Exile all cards from target player's library, then that player shuffles his or her hand into his or her library.

mc.name: Tomb Hex
mc.oracleText:
Target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn.
Landfall- If you had a land enter the battlefield under your control this turn, that creature gets -4/-4 until end of turn instead.
mc.printedText:
Target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn.
Landfall -- If you had a land enter the battlefield under your control this turn, that creature gets -4/-4 until end of turn instead.

mc.name: Kalastria Highborn
mc.oracleText: Whenever Kalastria Highborn or another Vampire you control is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, you may pay {B}. If you do, target player loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.
mc.printedText: Whenever Kalastria Highborn or another Vampire you control is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, you may pay {B}. If you do, target player loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.
mc.flavorText: Each of Malakir's great families boasts a contingent of nulls appropriate to its rank in society.

mc.name: Butcher of Malakir
mc.oracleText:
Flying
Whenever Butcher of Malakir or another creature you control is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, each opponent sacrifices a creature.
mc.printedText:
Flying
Whenever Butcher of Malakir or another creature you control is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, each opponent sacrifices a creature.
mc.flavorText: His verdict is always guilty. His sentence is always death.

mc.name: Halimar Excavator
mc.oracleText: Whenever Halimar Excavator or another Ally enters the battlefield under your control, target player puts the top X cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard, where X is the number of Allies you control.
mc.printedText: Whenever Halimar Excavator or another Ally enters the battlefield under your control, target player puts the top X cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard, where X is the number of Allies you control.

mc.name: Terastodon
mc.oracleText: When Terastodon enters the battlefield, you may destroy up to three target noncreature permanents. For each permanent put into a graveyard this way, its controller puts a 3/3 green Elephant creature token onto the battlefield.
mc.printedText: When Terastodon enters the battlefield, you may destroy up to three target noncreature permanents. For each permanent put into a graveyard this way, its controller puts a 3/3 green Elephant creature token onto the battlefield.

mc.name: Kazuul, Tyrant of the Cliffs
mc.oracleText: Whenever a creature an opponent controls attacks, if you're the defending player, put a 3/3 red Ogre creature token onto the battlefield unless that creature's controller pays {3}.
mc.printedText: Whenever a creature an opponent controls attacks, if you're the defending player, put a 3/3 red Ogre creature token onto the battlefield unless that creature's controller pays {3}.
mc.flavorText: Warning to those who scale the cliffs without paying tribute: It's a long way down.

mc.name: Kitesail
mc.oracleText:
Equipped creature gets +1/+0 and has flying.
Equip {2} ({2}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)
mc.printedText:
Equipped creature gets +1/+0 and has flying.
Equip {2} ({2}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)
mc.flavorText: Kitesailing is a way of life--and without practice, the end of it.

mc.name: Goliath Sphinx
mc.oracleText: Flying
mc.printedText: Flying
mc.flavorText: He makes his home on the tallest mountain in Sejiri, where the vista is as endless as his patience.

mc.name: Pulse Tracker
mc.oracleText: Whenever Pulse Tracker attacks, each opponent loses 1 life.
mc.printedText: Whenever Pulse Tracker attacks, each opponent loses 1 life.
mc.flavorText: Pulse trackers terrorize adventurers, driving them through the jungle toward certain death at the gates of Malakir.

mc.name: Bojuka Brigand
mc.oracleText:
Bojuka Brigand can't block.
Whenever Bojuka Brigand or another Ally enters the battlefield under your control, you may put a +1/+1 counter on Bojuka Brigand.
mc.printedText:
Bojuka Brigand can't block.
Whenever Bojuka Brigand or another Ally enters the battlefield under your control, you may put a +1/+1 counter on Bojuka Brigand.
mc.flavorText: "I don't do tactics. I don't do guard duty. I do damage. Take it or leave it."

mc.name: Admonition Angel
mc.oracleText:
Flying
Landfall- Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you may exile target nonland permanent other than Admonition Angel.
When Admonition Angel leaves the battlefield, return all cards exiled with it to the battlefield under their owners' control.

Flying
Landfall -- Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you may exile target nonland permanent other than Admonition Angel.

Flying

Flying
{1}{R}: Mordant Dragon gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

Haste

mc.name: Omnath, Locus of Mana

Green mana doesn't empty from your mana pool as steps and phases end.

Green mana doesn't empty from your mana pool as steps and phases end.

mc.name: Quag Vampires
mc.oracleText:
Multikicker {1}{B} (You may pay an additional {1}{B} any number of times as you cast this spell.)
Swampwalk

Islandwalk, swampwalk

mc.name: Bestial Menace

mc.printedText: Put a 1/1 green Snake creature token, a 2/2 green Wolf creature token, and a 3/3 green Elephant creature token onto the battlefield.

"My battle cry reaches ears far keener than yours."
--Saidah, Joraga hunter

mc.name: Sejiri Merfolk

mc.printedText: As long as you control a Plains, Sejiri Merfolk has first strike and lifelink. (Damage dealt by a creature with lifelink also causes its controller to gain that much life.)

mc.name: Quicksand
mc.oracleText:
{T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.
{T}, Sacrifice Quicksand: Target attacking creature without flying gets -1/-2 until end of turn.
mc.printedText:
{T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.
{T}, Sacrifice Quicksand: Target attacking creature without flying gets -1/-2 until end of turn.
mc.flavorText: Not all deaths are etched with mythic meaning and iconic glory.

mc.name: Dragonmaster Outcast
mc.oracleText: At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control six or more lands, put a 5/5 red Dragon creature token with flying onto the battlefield.
mc.printedText: At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control six or more lands, put a 5/5 red Dragon creature token with flying onto the battlefield.
mc.flavorText: "Cast out by my tribe, I am a pariah trapped in this mammal's carcass. Only my true kin hear my cries."

mc.name: Tectonic Edge
mc.oracleText:
{T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.
{1}, {T}, Sacrifice Tectonic Edge: Destroy target nonbasic land. Activate this ability only if an opponent controls four or more lands.
mc.printedText:
{T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.
{1}, {T}, Sacrifice Tectonic Edge: Destroy target nonbasic land. Activate this ability only if an opponent controls four or more lands.
mc.flavorText:
"We move because the earth does."
--Bruse Tarl, Goma Fada nomad

mc.name: Leatherback Baloth
mc.flavorText: Heavy enough to withstand the Roil, leatherback skeletons are havens for travelers in storms and landshifts.

mc.name: Novablast Wurm
mc.oracleText: Whenever Novablast Wurm attacks, destroy all other creatures.
mc.printedText: Whenever Novablast Wurm attacks, destroy all other creatures.
mc.flavorText:
"The sun was born within its coils, but it fled to the sky. The wurm hungers for its child, and the world will bear its loss."
--Screed of the Mul Daya

mc.name: Slavering Nulls
mc.oracleText: Whenever Slavering Nulls deals combat damage to a player, if you control a Swamp, you may have that player discard a card.
mc.printedText: Whenever Slavering Nulls deals combat damage to a player, if you control a Swamp, you may have that player discard a card.
mc.flavorText: Having lost their minds, they now want yours.

mc.name: Summit Apes
mc.oracleText: As long as you control a Mountain, Summit Apes can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.
mc.printedText: As long as you control a Mountain, Summit Apes can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.
mc.flavorText:
"If you climb Skyfang Peak, avoid the pass. Generations of apes made that trail, and they don't tolerate trespassers."
--Sachir, Akoum Expeditionary House

mc.name: Wind Zendikon

Enchant land

When enchanted land is put into a graveyard, return that card to its owner's hand.
mc.printedText:
Enchant land
Enchanted land is a 2/2 blue Elemental creature with flying. It's still a land.
When enchanted land is put into a graveyard, return that card to its owner's hand.

mc.name: Terra Eternal
mc.oracleText: All lands are indestructible.
mc.printedText: All lands are indestructible.
mc.flavorText:
"If this world could make a wish, it would be to survive the parasites who loot its treasures and threaten its life force."
--Saidah, Joraga hunter

mc.name: Abyssal Persecutor
mc.oracleText:
Flying, trample
You can't win the game and your opponents can't lose the game.
mc.printedText:
Flying, trample
You can't win the game and your opponents can't lose the game.

mc.flavorText: In Zendikar, today's grassland could be tomorrow's jungle, and hunting grounds change as quickly as the weather.

mc.printedText: Whenever Shoreline Salvager deals combat damage to a player, if you control an Island, you may draw a card.
mc.flavorText:
"They search for treasures that wash up from the depths. Tracking one could lead you to riches. Or in circles."
--Javad Nasrin, Ondu relic hunter

mc.name: Iona's Judgment
mc.oracleText: Exile target creature or enchantment.
mc.printedText: Exile target creature or enchantment.
mc.flavorText: Beneath the gaze of angels, only the righteous may stand without fear.

mc.name: Eye of Ugin
mc.oracleText:
Colorless Eldrazi spells you cast cost {2} less to cast.
{7}, {T}: Search your library for a colorless creature card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.
mc.printedText:
Colorless Eldrazi spells you cast cost {2} less to cast.
{7}, {T}: Search your library for a colorless creature card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.
mc.flavorText: An eye closes. A race awakens.

mc.name: Arbor Elf
mc.oracleText: {T}: Untap target Forest.
mc.printedText: {T}: Untap target Forest.
mc.flavorText: The Mul Daya elves reject their Tajuru kin, calling them arrogant tree-binders who think the roots serve the canopy.

mc.name: Treasure Hunt
mc.oracleText: Reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a nonland card, then put all cards revealed this way into your hand.
mc.printedText: Reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a nonland card, then put all cards revealed this way into your hand.
mc.flavorText:
"The longer the journey, the more one learns."
--Isanke, Halimar seastalker

mc.name: Thada Adel, Acquisitor
mc.oracleText:
Islandwalk
Whenever Thada Adel, Acquisitor deals combat damage to a player, search that player's library for an artifact card and exile it. Then that player shuffles his or her library. Until end of turn, you may play that card.

Islandwalk
Whenever Thada Adel, Acquisitor deals combat damage to a player, search that player's library for an artifact card and exile it. Then that player shuffles his or her library. Until end of turn, you may play that card.

Equipped creature has deathtouch and lifelink.
Equip {2}
mc.printedText:
Equipped creature has deathtouch and lifelink.
Equip {2}
mc.flavorText: During their endless travels, the mages of the Goma Fada caravan have learned ways to harness both life and death.

mc.name: Nature's Claim
mc.oracleText: Destroy target artifact or enchantment. Its controller gains 4 life.
mc.printedText: Destroy target artifact or enchantment. Its controller gains 4 life.
mc.flavorText:
"On this plane, the use of magic can provoke a ferocious reprisal from nature. Whoever the Eldrazi were, their relics left Zendikar forever enraged."
--Jace Beleren

mc.name: Akoum Battlesinger
mc.oracleText:
Haste
Whenever Akoum Battlesinger or another Ally enters the battlefield under your control, you may have Ally creatures you control get +1/+0 until end of turn.
mc.printedText:
Haste
Whenever Akoum Battlesinger or another Ally enters the battlefield under your control, you may have Ally creatures you control get +1/+0 until end of turn.

mc.name: Perimeter Captain

Defender
Whenever a creature you control with defender blocks, you may gain 2 life.
mc.printedText:
Defender
Whenever a creature you control with defender blocks, you may gain 2 life.
mc.flavorText: "We stand between the jaws of chaos and the mantle of order."

mc.name: Feral Contest
mc.oracleText: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control. Another target creature blocks it this turn if able.
mc.printedText: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control. Another target creature blocks it this turn if able.
mc.flavorText: The instinct for survival makes enemies of all.

mc.name: Bazaar Trader
mc.oracleText: {T}: Target player gains control of target artifact, creature, or land you control.
mc.printedText: {T}: Target player gains control of target artifact, creature, or land you control.
mc.flavorText: "No need for a hurda? How about these maps to recently discovered tombs? Or these vials of invisible potion? Very fancy . . ."

mc.name: Pilgrim's Eye
mc.oracleText:
Flying
When Pilgrim's Eye enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.
mc.printedText:
Flying
When Pilgrim's Eye enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.
mc.flavorText: The kor send their thopter kites to see if the land is in a welcoming mood.

mc.name: Urge to Feed
mc.oracleText: Target creature gets -3/-3 until end of turn. You may tap any number of untapped Vampire creatures you control. If you do, put a +1/+1 counter on each of those Vampires.
mc.printedText: Target creature gets -3/-3 until end of turn. You may tap any number of untapped Vampire creatures you control. If you do, put a +1/+1 counter on each of those Vampires.

mc.name: Surrakar Banisher
mc.oracleText: When Surrakar Banisher enters the battlefield, you may return target tapped creature to its owner's hand.
mc.printedText: When Surrakar Banisher enters the battlefield, you may return target tapped creature to its owner's hand.
mc.flavorText: Surrakar grab things they don't want.

mc.name: Grappler Spider
mc.oracleText: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
mc.printedText: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
mc.flavorText: Creatures of the air wisely avoid the darkest regions of Guul Draz--which is why grappler spiders inhabit the few places touched by the sun's rays.

mc.name: Death's Shadow
mc.oracleText: Death's Shadow gets -X/-X, where X is your life total.
mc.printedText: Death's Shadow gets -X/-X, where X is your life total.
mc.flavorText: The shadow of the candle looms tall even as its light grows dim.

mc.name: Everflowing Chalice
mc.oracleText:
Multikicker {2} (You may pay an additional {2} any number of times as you cast this spell.)
Everflowing Chalice enters the battlefield with a charge counter on it for each time it was kicked.

Everflowing Chalice enters the battlefield with a charge counter on it for each time it was kicked.

mc.name: Walking Atlas
mc.oracleText: {T}: You may put a land card from your hand onto the battlefield.
mc.printedText: {T}: You may put a land card from your hand onto the battlefield.
mc.flavorText: Crafted by lullmages and bound to the land, it alters itself to match the tumultuous terrain.

mc.name: Caustic Crawler
mc.oracleText: Landfall- Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you may have target creature get -1/-1 until end of turn.
mc.printedText: Landfall -- Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you may have target creature get -1/-1 until end of turn.
mc.flavorText: Novice explorers can mistake the acid-carved stone lairs for ancient ruins. They rarely survive to learn better.

mc.name: Ruin Ghost
mc.oracleText: {W}, {T}: Exile target land you control, then return it to the battlefield under your control.
mc.printedText: {W}, {T}: Exile target land you control, then return it to the battlefield under your control.
mc.flavorText: The Forsaken Ones haunt the ruins that flicker in and out of the spirit realm. Such sites are hard to find and even harder to loot.

mc.name: Scrib Nibblers
mc.oracleText:
{T}: Exile the top card of target player's library. If it's a land card, you gain 1 life.
Landfall- Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you may untap Scrib Nibblers.
mc.printedText:
{T}: Exile the top card of target player's library. If it's a land card, you gain 1 life.
Landfall -- Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you may untap Scrib Nibblers.

mc.name: Stoneforge Mystic
mc.oracleText:
When Stoneforge Mystic enters the battlefield, you may search your library for an Equipment card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.
{1}{W}, {T}: You may put an Equipment card from your hand onto the battlefield.

When Stoneforge Mystic enters the battlefield, you may search your library for an Equipment card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.
{1}{W}, {T}: You may put an Equipment card from your hand onto the battlefield.

mc.name: Veteran's Reflexes
mc.oracleText: Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn. Untap that creature.
mc.printedText: Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn. Untap that creature.
mc.flavorText: "Assume everything wants to kill you. At the very least, assume everything wants what's in your pack."

mc.name: Quest for the Nihil Stone
mc.oracleText:
Whenever an opponent discards a card, you may put a quest counter on Quest for the Nihil Stone.
At the beginning of each opponent's upkeep, if that player has no cards in hand and Quest for the Nihil Stone has two or more quest counters on it, you may have that player lose 5 life.
mc.printedText:
Whenever an opponent discards a card, you may put a quest counter on Quest for the Nihil Stone.
At the beginning of each opponent's upkeep, if that player has no cards in hand and Quest for the Nihil Stone has two or more quest counters on it, you may have that player lose 5 life.

mc.name: Jwari Shapeshifter
mc.oracleText: You may have Jwari Shapeshifter enter the battlefield as a copy of any Ally creature on the battlefield.
mc.printedText: You may have Jwari Shapeshifter enter the battlefield as a copy of any Ally creature on the battlefield.
mc.flavorText: "The best expedition would be an entire team of me."

mc.name: Quest for the Goblin Lord
mc.oracleText:
Whenever a Goblin enters the battlefield under your control, you may put a quest counter on Quest for the Goblin Lord.
As long as Quest for the Goblin Lord has five or more quest counters on it, creatures you control get +2/+0.
mc.printedText:
Whenever a Goblin enters the battlefield under your control, you may put a quest counter on Quest for the Goblin Lord.
As long as Quest for the Goblin Lord has five or more quest counters on it, creatures you control get +2/+0.
mc.flavorText: A shrine to unchecked desire.

Multikicker {1}{W} (You may pay an additional {1}{W} any number of times as you cast this spell.)
Creatures you control get +1/+1.
When Marshal's Anthem enters the battlefield, return up to X target creature cards from your graveyard to the battlefield, where X is the number of times Marshal's Anthem was kicked.

mc.name: Battle Hurda
mc.oracleText: First strike
mc.printedText: First strike
mc.flavorText:
"Murasan hurdas were too aggressive to tolerate a harness, so we put them on guard duty. Now the bandits can't get within spitting distance of us."
--Bruse Tarl, Goma Fada nomad

mc.name: Razor Boomerang
mc.oracleText:
Equipped creature has "{T}, Unattach Razor Boomerang: Razor Boomerang deals 1 damage to target creature or player. Return Razor Boomerang to its owner's hand."

mc.name: Twitch
mc.oracleText:
You may tap or untap target artifact, creature, or land.
Draw a card.
mc.printedText:
You may tap or untap target artifact, creature, or land.
Draw a card.
mc.flavorText:
"The flow is diverted. Your path is clear. What are you waiting for--the cave to bid you welcome?"
--Maizah Shere, Tazeem lullmage

mc.name: Hada Freeblade
mc.oracleText: Whenever Hada Freeblade or another Ally enters the battlefield under your control, you may put a +1/+1 counter on Hada Freeblade.
mc.printedText: Whenever Hada Freeblade or another Ally enters the battlefield under your control, you may put a +1/+1 counter on Hada Freeblade.
mc.flavorText: "I toiled in Kazuul's mines when I was eight. I think I'm tough enough for a little hiking."

mc.name: Quest for Ula's Temple
mc.oracleText:
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may look at the top card of your library. If it's a creature card, you may reveal it and put a quest counter on Quest for Ula's Temple.
At the beginning of each end step, if there are three or more quest counters on Quest for Ula's Temple, you may put a Kraken, Leviathan, Octopus, or Serpent creature card from your hand onto the battlefield.
mc.printedText:
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may look at the top card of your library. If it's a creature card, you may reveal it and put a quest counter on Quest for Ula's Temple.
At the beginning of each end step, if there are three or more quest counters on Quest for Ula's Temple, you may put a Kraken, Leviathan, Octopus, or Serpent creature card from your hand onto the battlefield.

mc.name: Agadeem Occultist

mc.printedText: {T}: Put target creature card from an opponent's graveyard onto the battlefield under your control if its converted mana cost is less than or equal to the number of Allies you control.

mc.name: Bull Rush
mc.oracleText: Target creature gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
mc.printedText: Target creature gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
mc.flavorText: "It's gone mad! Loose the chains and save what you can!"

mc.name: Seer's Sundial
mc.oracleText: Landfall- Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you may pay {2}. If you do, draw a card.
mc.printedText: Landfall -- Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you may pay {2}. If you do, draw a card.
mc.flavorText: "The shadow travels toward the apex. I predict we will soon see the true measure of darkness."

mc.name: Dispel
mc.oracleText: Counter target instant spell.
mc.printedText: Counter target instant spell.
mc.flavorText: The Jwari winds undo reality as easily as they scatter a pile of leaves.

mc.name: Cunning Sparkmage
mc.oracleText:
Haste
{T}: Cunning Sparkmage deals 1 damage to target creature or player.
mc.printedText:
Haste
{T}: Cunning Sparkmage deals 1 damage to target creature or player.
mc.flavorText: "I see the weaknesses you hide even from yourself."

mc.name: Cosi's Ravager
mc.oracleText: Landfall- Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you may have Cosi's Ravager deal 1 damage to target player.
mc.printedText: Landfall -- Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you may have Cosi's Ravager deal 1 damage to target player.
mc.flavorText:
"Cosi has many followers. Even the volcano finds a way to do his bidding."
--Zakken, Enclave cleric

mc.name: Vastwood Animist
mc.oracleText: {T}: Target land you control becomes an X/X Elemental creature until end of turn, where X is the number of Allies you control. It's still a land.
mc.printedText: {T}: Target land you control becomes an X/X Elemental creature until end of turn, where X is the number of Allies you control. It's still a land.
mc.flavorText: He calls on the forests for counsel and summons the earth to his cause.

mc.name: Æther Tradewinds
mc.oracleText: Return target permanent you control and target permanent you don't control to their owners' hands.
mc.printedText: Return target permanent you control and target permanent you don't control to their owners' hands.
mc.flavorText:
"The wind smells of misfortune. Check your knots."
--Anitan, Ondu cleric

mc.name: Avenger of Zendikar
mc.oracleText:
When Avenger of Zendikar enters the battlefield, put a 0/1 green Plant creature token onto the battlefield for each land you control.
Landfall- Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you may put a +1/+1 counter on each Plant creature you control.
mc.printedText:
When Avenger of Zendikar enters the battlefield, put a 0/1 green Plant creature token onto the battlefield for each land you control.
Landfall -- Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you may put a +1/+1 counter on each Plant creature you control.

mc.name: Brink of Disaster
mc.oracleText:
Enchant creature or land
When enchanted permanent becomes tapped, destroy it.
mc.printedText:
Enchant creature or land
When enchanted permanent becomes tapped, destroy it.
mc.flavorText:
"You always have a choice. That doesn't mean you always have a good choice."
--Alubri, Guul Draz gatekeeper

mc.name: Chain Reaction
mc.oracleText: Chain Reaction deals X damage to each creature, where X is the number of creatures on the battlefield.
mc.printedText: Chain Reaction deals X damage to each creature, where X is the number of creatures on the battlefield.
mc.flavorText:
"We train for the improbable, like lightning striking the same place twice, or striking everywhere at once."
--Nundari, Sea Gate militia captain

mc.name: Archon of Redemption
mc.oracleText:
Flying
Whenever Archon of Redemption or another creature with flying enters the battlefield under your control, you may gain life equal to that creature's power.
mc.printedText:
Flying
Whenever Archon of Redemption or another creature with flying enters the battlefield under your control, you may gain life equal to that creature's power.
mc.flavorText: Until Emeria is freed, he raises his sword in her name.

mc.name: Explore
mc.oracleText:
You may play an additional land this turn.
Draw a card.
mc.printedText:
You may play an additional land this turn.
Draw a card.
mc.flavorText: An explorer's reward is a view of tomorrow's possibilities.

mc.name: Tuktuk Scrapper
mc.oracleText: Whenever Tuktuk Scrapper or another Ally enters the battlefield under your control, you may destroy target artifact. If that artifact is put into a graveyard this way, Tuktuk Scrapper deals damage to that artifact's controller equal to the number of Allies you control.
mc.printedText: Whenever Tuktuk Scrapper or another Ally enters the battlefield under your control, you may destroy target artifact. If that artifact is put into a graveyard this way, Tuktuk Scrapper deals damage to that artifact's controller equal to the number of Allies you control.

mc.name: Dread Statuary
mc.oracleText:
{T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.
{4}: Dread Statuary becomes a 4/2 Golem artifact creature until end of turn. It's still a land.
mc.printedText:
{T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.
{4}: Dread Statuary becomes a 4/2 Golem artifact creature until end of turn. It's still a land.
mc.flavorText: The last reliable landmark in Tazeem just walked away.
